Project Supervisor Job at H & Y Furniture Manufacturers




        
    

        
        H & Y Furniture Manufacturers is a lifestyle design and space enhancement company dedicated to improving the lives of people wherever they live, work or play. As a full service furniture manufacturing company in Lagos Nigeria, we specialize in designing, manufacturing and installing modular furniture for all kinds of spaces – business, educational and residential projects.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Project Supervisor

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

            
    




	We are seeking an experienced Project Supervisor with an architectural background to plan,organize, and oversee all installation processes, ensuring seamless service delivery andclient satisfaction.


Responsibilities
Strategy & Budgets:


	Implement and maintain installation strategies aligned with customer objectives.
	Develop systems to track productivity, standards, and performance targets to ensure effective installation and project completion.
	Provide daily updates on site status and progress.


Installation Planning & Organizing:


	Plan and oversee day-to-day site installations to meet specifications and deadlinesand exceed our customers’ expectations
	Optimize workflows and evaluate installation schedules for team development tomeasure due date delivery performance.
	Conduct pre-installation meetings and implement cost-saving strategies to reduceexpenses and increase productivity across all client sites
	Develop and maintain metrics for quality, delivery, and safety.


Team Management:


	Build strong rapport with the installation team through open communication,promote a positive, safe , productive and efficient work environment
	Continually analyze, identify and set expectations to motivate team members toachieve objectives and goals
	Daily appraisal of team members to ensure excellent performance.


Quality Assurance:


	Ensure products meet quality standards to reduce rework costs.
	Monitor installation standards at all stages.


Process Improvement:


	Recommend measures to minimize waste and improve installation practices.
	Promote continuous improvement and self-development.


Customer Management:


	Ensure timely, cost-effective delivery of installations.
	Provide regular updates to clients on project progress.


Key Requirements


	HND / B.Sc Degreein Architecture or any other relevant discipline
	Advanced Degrees (M.Sc., MBA) or certifications (PMP) are an advantage.
	Minimum of 5 years of relevant experience, preferably in furniture manufacturing orarchitecture.
	Strong communication, teamwork, and organizational skills.
	Proficient in strategic thinking, project management, and problem-solving.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a cover letter detailing their relevant experience to: hnyfurniture@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email

title: Job Vacancies at Vantegral Consulting
content:
Vantegral Consulting is well-positioned to provide innovative and consultative solutions for human, entrepreneurial, and technological advancement and development. Our Human Capacity Development solutions include Recruitment and Talent Acquisition Services, Training and Development Programs, Outsourcing and Support, and Executive Search.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Business Development Executive

Job Location: Lagos
Industry: Human Resources

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are looking for a driven and results-oriented Business Development Officer to join our team in the Human Resources and Recruitment industry.
	The role is focused on identifying new business opportunities, developing client relationships, and driving growth through innovative HR and recruitment solutions.
	The ideal candidate will have strong networking skills, a keen understanding of HR/recruitment services, and the ability to turn opportunities into long-term partnerships.


Key Responsibilities


	Identify and pursue new business opportunities within the HR and recruitment industry.
	Build, manage, and maintain strong client relationships to generate repeat business
	Develop and present tailored proposals, bids, and solutions to meet client needs.
	Collaborate with internal HR and recruitment teams to deliver customized services.
	Conduct market research and competitor analysis to identify trends and opportunities.
	Represent the company at networking events, industry forums, and client meetings.
	Manage the end-to-end business development process, from prospecting to contract negotiation and closure.
	Meet and exceed sales targets while contributing to the organization’s growth strategy.
	Maintain accurate reports of business activities, pipelines, and client feedback.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Human Resources, or a related field.
	Minimum of 2–4 years of experience in business development, preferably within the HR, recruitment, or professional services industry.
	Strong knowledge of HR and recruitment services, including outsourcing, staffing, and talent management.
	Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills.
	Proven ability to generate leads, close deals, and build lasting client partnerships.
	Self-motivated, target-driven, and able to work independently.
	Proficiency in MS Office and CRM tools.
	Professional certifications in HR (e.g., CIPM, SHRM) or Business Development are an added advantage.
	Established network within the HR and recruitment ecosystem.
	Experience working with corporate clients across different industries.


Application Closing Date: 27 September, 2025.

Click here to apply online

 

 

2.) Swimming Pool Technician

Job Location: Lagos 

Job Summary


	We are seeking a reliable and detail-oriented Pool Technician to join our team.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for the maintenance, repair, and cleaning of various swimming pools, ensuring they are safe, clean, and in optimal working condition for our clients.


Responsibilities


	Perform routine cleaning and maintenance tasks, including skimming, vacuuming, and brushing pool surfaces.
	Monitor and balance pool water chemistry by testing and adjusting chemical levels (chlorine, pH, alkalinity, etc.).
	Inspect, diagnose, and repair pool equipment, such as pumps, filters, heaters, and chlorinators.
	Conduct equipment installations and upgrades as needed.
	Maintain accurate records of services performed, including chemical usage and equipment repairs.
	Respond to and resolve customer inquiries and concerns in a professional and timely manner.
	Educate clients on proper pool care and maintenance.
	Ensure compliance with all safety regulations and company policies.
	Maintain a clean and organized work vehicle and a professional appearance


Requirements


	Proven experience as a Pool Technician or in a related field.
	Strong knowledge of pool chemistry, equipment, and maintenance procedures.
	Ability to troubleshoot and repair a wide range of pool equipment. Excellent customer service and communication skills.
	Ability to work independently and manage a schedule effectively.
	Physical stamina and the ability to lift heavy equipment and work outdoors in various weather conditions.


Preferred Qualifications:


	Experience with automated pool systems.
	Knowledge of local health and safety codes


Application Closing Date: 26th August, 2025.

Click here to apply online

 

3.) Head of Government / Industry Relations

Job Location: Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Oil and Gas

Job Summary 


	The Head of Government & Industry Relations will serve as the primary liaison between the company and key government, regulatory, and industry bodies in the Nigerian oil and gas sector.
	The role is critical to the company's success, focusing on building and managing strategic relationships to secure business, ensure regulatory compliance, and position the company favorably in the market.


Key Responsibilities


	Relationship Management: Manage, supervise, and coordinate all functions related to government relations, client relations, and Nigerian content. Establish and maintain strong relationships with key officials, regulators, and policymakers within NCDMB,NUPRC,NUIMS, and other related industry agencies.
	Business Development: Utilize contacts within government agencies to generate new business opportunities and secure successful bids for the company's projects.
	Market Intelligence & Strategy: Gather intelligence on ongoing and upcoming projects and tenders, and develop strategic plans to position the company for success. Monitor competitor activities and provide actionable advice to company management.
	Regulatory Compliance: Monitor changes in government and industry policies and legislation. Ensure the company is up-to-date and in full compliance with all laws, rules, and regulations, including those related to Nigerian content.
	Internal & External Liaison: Facilitate effective communication and collaboration between the company's internal teams and external regulatory bodies. Represent the company's interests in all regulatory matters and discussions.
	Nigerian Content Oversight: Manage and supervise the company’s Nigerian content development activities in line with regulatory requirements.
	Project Support: Provide necessary support to Project Management teams in both Lagos and Port Harcourt, particularly in tender tracking.


Qualifications


	A good University Degree.
	Minimum of 4 years of relevant, cognate experience.
	Good general knowledge of Oil field operations in both Onshore and Offshore locations.
	Strong planning and organizational skills; ability to work independently with minimal supervision.
	Proficiency in computer skills, especially Microsoft Excel, Word, PowerPoint, and email applications.
	Strong people skills and demonstrated ability to work effectively with a diverse workforce.


Application Closing Date: 1st September, 2025.

title: Job Openings at Precious Palm Royal Hotel
content:
Precious Palm Royal Hotel  - Design and comfort are perfectly combined here, because we care about your well-being - all the materials used for room decoration are environment friendly, and your individual climate control can be adjusted accurately by degree.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Driver

Job Location: Ugbowor, Benin, Edo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Purpose
     

            
    




	The Driver is responsible for providing safe, reliable, and efficient transportation services for the organization.
	The role requires strict adherence to traffic laws, company policies, and a commitment to ensuring the safety and comfort of passengers, goods, and company property.


Key Responsibilities


	Safely operate company vehicles to transport staff, clients, and materials to designated locations.
	Ensure vehicles are maintained in excellent condition by carrying out routine checks (fuel, oil, water, tires, lights, etc.).
	Maintain accurate records of trips, mileage, fuel consumption, and servicing.
	Keep the assigned vehicle clean, inside and out, at all times.
	Assist with loading and unloading of goods, materials, or equipment when required.
